author: Nate McFeters
content:
PDP,

Thanks for the plug and the kind words!  We also look forward to seeing your talk.  I suppose you could call us the XS-Sniper crew, I kind of like the ring of that :).

Let's definitely catch up and get some beers, I'll call you when I get in tomorrow evening.

-Nate
